# defaultFocusRingType

**Type Property**

Returns the default focus ring type.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var defaultFocusRingType: NSFocusRingType { get }
```

## Return Value

The default type of focus ring for objects of the view’s class. Possible return values are listed in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFocusRingType].

## Discussion

If the value in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/focusRingType] property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFocusRingType/default], the view can call this class method to find out what type of focus ring is the default. The view is free to ignore the default setting.

## Drawing the Focus Ring

- **focusRingType**: The type of focus ring drawn around the view.
- **focusRingMaskBounds**: The focus ring mask bounds, specified in the view’s coordinate space.
- **drawFocusRingMask()**: Draws the focus ring mask for the view.
- **noteFocusRingMaskChanged()**: Invoked to notify the view that the focus ring mask requires updating.
- **setKeyboardFocusRingNeedsDisplay(_:)**: Invalidates the area around the focus ring.
